mapper.insert: INSERT INTO artmateDB.Signal (getUserId, sendUserId, messageId, sendUserName, img, exName, description, sigDate, sigType, subType, artmateDB.Signal.read) VALUES (#{getUserId}, #{sendUserId},#{messageId},#{sendUserName},#{img},#{exName}, #{description}, #{sigDate},#{sigType},#{subType},#{read})
mapper.update: UPDATE artmateDB.Signal SET artmateDB.Signal.read=1 WHERE id=#{id};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM artmateDB.Signal WHERE getUserId=#{userId} and artmateDB.Signal.read=0
